question: The Indian Muslims, in general, were not attracted to the Extremist movement because of the which of the following reasons?
option1: influence of Sir Sayyid Ahmed Khan
option4: Extremists’ policy of harping on Hindu past
answer: Extremists’ policy of harping on Hindu past
explanation: The Indian Muslims, in general, were not attracted to the Extremist movement because of the extremists’ policy of harping on Hindu past.
